(See ErrorReporter for details)"}},"_setCollateralFactor(address,uint256)":{"details":"Admin function to set per-market collateralFactor","params":{"hToken":"The market to set the factor on","newCollateralFactorMantissa":"The new collateral factor, scaled by 1e18"},"returns":{"_0":"uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. market to verify the borrow against"},"returns":{"_0":"0 if the borrow is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)"}},"borrowVerify(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"borrowAmount":"The amount of the underlying asset requested to borrow","borrower":"The address borrowing the underlying","hToken":"Asset whose underlying is being borrowed"}},"checkMembership(address,address)":{"params":{"account":"The address of the account to check","hToken":"The hToken to check"},"returns":{"_0":"True if the account is in the asset, otherwise false."}},"enterMarkets(address[])":{"params":{"hTokens":"The list of addresses of the hToken markets to be enabled"},"returns":{"_0":"Success indicator for whether each corresponding market was entered"}},"exitMarket(address)":{"details":"Sender must not have an outstanding borrow balance in the asset, or be providing neccessary collateral for an outstanding borrow.","params":{"hTokenAddress":"The address of the asset to be removed"},"returns":{"_0":"Whether or not the account successfully exited the market"}},"getAllMarkets()":{"details":"The automatic getter may be used to access an individual market.","returns":{"_0":"The list of market addresses"}},"getAssetsIn(address)":{"params":{"account":"The address of the account to pull assets for"},"returns":{"_0":"A dynamic list with the assets the account has entered"}},"getHypotheticalAccountLiquidity(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"account":"The account to determine liquidity for","borrowAmount":"The amount of underlying to hypothetically borrow","hTokenModify":"The market to hypothetically redeem/borrow in","redeemTokens":"The number of tokens to hypothetically redeem"},"returns":{"_0":"(possible error code (semi-opaque), hypothetical account liquidity in excess of collateral requirements,         hypothetical account shortfall below collateral requirements)"}},"liquidateBorrowAllowed(address,address,address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"borrower":"The address of the borrower","hTokenBorrowed":"Asset which was borrowed by the borrower","hTokenCollateral":"Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized","liquidator":"The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral","repayAmount":"The amount of underlying being repaid"}},"liquidateBorrowVerify(address,address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"actualRepayAmount":"The amount of underlying being repaid","borrower":"The address of the seizing the collateral"}},"liquidateCalculateSeizeTokens(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"Used in liquidation (called in hToken.liquidateBorrowFresh)","params":{"actualRepayAmount":"The amount of hTokenBorrowed underlying to convert into hTokenCollateral tokens","hTokenBorrowed":"The address of the borrowed hToken","hTokenCollateral":"The address of the collateral hToken"},"returns":{"_0":"(errorCode, number of hTokenCollateral tokens to be seized in a liquidation)"}},"mintAllowed(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"hToken":"The market to verify the mint against","mintAmount":"The amount of underlying being supplied to the market in exchange for tokens","minter":"The account which would get the minted tokens"},"returns":{"_0":"0 if the mint is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)"}},"mintVerify(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"actualMintAmount":"The amount of the underlying asset being minted","hToken":"Asset being minted","mintTokens":"The number of tokens being minted","minter":"The address minting the tokens"}},"redeemAllowed(address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"hToken":"The market to verify the redeem against","redeemTokens":"The number of hTokens to exchange for the underlying asset in the market","redeemer":"The account which would redeem the tokens"},"returns":{"_0":"0 if the redeem is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)"}},"redeemVerify(address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"hToken":"Asset being redeemed","redeemAmount":"The amount of the underlying asset being redeemed","redeemTokens":"The number of tokens being redeemed","redeemer":"The address redeeming the tokens"}},"repayBorrowAllowed(address,address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"borrower":"The account which would borrowed the asset","hToken":"The market to verify the repay against","payer":"The account which would repay the asset","repayAmount":"The amount of the underlying asset the account would repay"},"returns":{"_0":"0 if the repay is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)"}},"repayBorrowVerify(address,address,address,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"actualRepayAmount":"The amount of underlying being repaid","borrower":"The address of the borrower","hToken":"Asset being repaid","payer":"The address repaying the borrow"}},"seizeAllowed(address,address,address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"borrower":"The address of the borrower","hTokenBorrowed":"Asset which was borrowed by the borrower","hTokenCollateral":"Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized","liquidator":"The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral","seizeTokens":"The number of collateral tokens to seize"}},"seizeVerify(address,address,address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"borrower":"The address of the borrower","hTokenBorrowed":"Asset which was borrowed by the borrower","hTokenCollateral":"Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized","liquidator":"The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral","seizeTokens":"The number of collateral tokens to seize"}},"transferAllowed(address,address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"dst":"The account which receives the allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)"}},"transferVerify(address,address,address,uint256)":{"params":{"dst":"The account which receives the tokens","hToken":"Asset being transferred","src":"The account which sources the tokens","transferTokens":"The number of hTokens to transfer"}}},"title":"Hades' MarketController Contract"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"_setCloseFactor(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the closeFactor used when liquidating borrows"},"_setCollateralFactor(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Sets the collateralFactor for a market"},"_setLiquidationIncentive(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets liquidationIncentive"},"_setMaxAssets(uint256)":{"notice":"Sets maxAssets which controls how many markets can be market"},"borrowVerify(address,address,uint256)":{"notice":"Validates borrow and reverts on rejection. returns._0: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See ErrorReporter for details)

_setCollateralFactor(address,uint256).details: Admin function to set per-market collateralFactor

params.hToken: The market to set the factor on
params.newCollateralFactorMantissa: The new collateral factor, scaled by 1e18

returns._0: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See ErrorReporter for details)
uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See ErrorReporter for details)
uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See ErrorReporter for details)

params.newPauseGuardian: The address of the new Pause Guardian

returns._0: uint 0=success, otherwise a failure. (See enum Error for details)

_supportMarket(address).details: Admin function to set isListed and add support for the market

params.hToken: The address of the market (token) to list

params.borrowAmount: The amount of underlying the account would borrow
params.borrower: The account which would borrow the asset
params.hToken: The market to verify the borrow against

returns._0: 0 if the borrow is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)

params.borrowAmount: The amount of the underlying asset requested to borrow
params.hToken: Asset whose underlying is being borrowed

params.account: The address of the account to check

returns._0: True if the account is in the asset, otherwise false.

params.hTokens: The list of addresses of the hToken markets to be enabled

returns._0: Success indicator for whether each corresponding market was entered

exitMarket(address).details: Sender must not have an outstanding borrow balance in the asset, or be providing neccessary collateral for an outstanding borrow.

params.hTokenAddress: The address of the asset to be removed

returns._0: Whether or not the account successfully exited the market

getAllMarkets().details: The automatic getter may be used to access an individual market.

params.account: The address of the account to pull assets for

returns._0: A dynamic list with the assets the account has entered

params.account: The account to determine liquidity for
params.borrowAmount: The amount of underlying to hypothetically borrow
params.hTokenModify: The market to hypothetically redeem/borrow in
params.redeemTokens: The number of tokens to hypothetically redeem

returns._0: (possible error code (semi-opaque), hypothetical account liquidity in excess of collateral requirements,         hypothetical account shortfall below collateral requirements)

params.hTokenBorrowed: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower
params.hTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized
params.liquidator: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral
params.repayAmount: The amount of underlying being repaid

params.actualRepayAmount: The amount of underlying being repaid
params.hTokenBorrowed: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower
params.hTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized
params.liquidator: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral

params.actualRepayAmount: The amount of hTokenBorrowed underlying to convert into hTokenCollateral tokens
params.hTokenBorrowed: The address of the borrowed hToken
params.hTokenCollateral: The address of the collateral hToken

returns._0: (errorCode, number of hTokenCollateral tokens to be seized in a liquidation)

params.hToken: The market to verify the mint against
params.mintAmount: The amount of underlying being supplied to the market in exchange for tokens
params.minter: The account which would get the minted tokens

returns._0: 0 if the mint is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)

params.actualMintAmount: The amount of the underlying asset being minted
params.mintTokens: The number of tokens being minted

params.hToken: The market to verify the redeem against
params.redeemTokens: The number of hTokens to exchange for the underlying asset in the market
params.redeemer: The account which would redeem the tokens

returns._0: 0 if the redeem is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)

params.redeemAmount: The amount of the underlying asset being redeemed
params.redeemTokens: The number of tokens being redeemed

params.borrower: The account which would borrowed the asset
params.hToken: The market to verify the repay against
params.payer: The account which would repay the asset
params.repayAmount: The amount of the underlying asset the account would repay

returns._0: 0 if the repay is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)

params.actualRepayAmount: The amount of underlying being repaid

params.hTokenBorrowed: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower
params.hTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized
params.liquidator: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral
params.seizeTokens: The number of collateral tokens to seize

params.hTokenBorrowed: Asset which was borrowed by the borrower
params.hTokenCollateral: Asset which was used as collateral and will be seized
params.liquidator: The address repaying the borrow and seizing the collateral
params.seizeTokens: The number of collateral tokens to seize

params.dst: The account which receives the tokens
params.hToken: The market to verify the transfer against
params.src: The account which sources the tokens
params.transferTokens: The number of hTokens to transfer

returns._0: 0 if the transfer is allowed, otherwise a semi-opaque error code (See ErrorReporter.sol)

params.dst: The account which receives the tokens
params.src: The account which sources the tokens
params.transferTokens: The number of hTokens to transfer

_setCloseFactor(uint256).notice: Sets the closeFactor used when liquidating borrows

_setCollateralFactor(address,uint256).notice: Sets the collateralFactor for a market

_setMaxAssets(uint256).notice: Sets maxAssets which controls how many markets can be entered

_setPauseGuardian(address).notice: Admin function to change the Pause Guardian

_supportMarket(address).notice: Add the market to the markets mapping and set it as listed

borrowAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to borrow the underlying asset of the given market

borrowVerify(address,address,uint256).notice: Validates borrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

checkMembership(address,address).notice: Returns whether the given account is entered in the given asset

enterMarkets(address[]).notice: Add assets to be included in account liquidity calculation

exitMarket(address).notice: Removes asset from sender's account liquidity calculation

getAccountLiquidity(address).notice: Determine the current account liquidity wrt collateral requirements

getAssetsIn(address).notice: Returns the assets an account has entered

getHypotheticalAccountLiquidity(address,.notice: Determine what the account liquidity would be if the given amounts were redeemed/borrowed

liquidateBorrowAllowed(address,address,a.notice: Checks if the liquidation should be allowed to occur

liquidateBorrowVerify(address,address,ad.notice: Validates liquidateBorrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

liquidateCalculateSeizeTokens(address,ad.notice: Calculate number of tokens of collateral asset to seize given an underlying amount

mintAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to mint tokens in the given market

mintVerify(address,address,uint256,uint2.notice: Validates mint and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

redeemAllowed(address,address,uint256).notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to redeem tokens in the given market

redeemVerify(address,address,uint256,uin.notice: Validates redeem and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

repayBorrowAllowed(address,address,addre.notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to repay a borrow in the given market

repayBorrowVerify(address,address,addres.notice: Validates repayBorrow and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

seizeAllowed(address,address,address,add.notice: Checks if the seizing of assets should be allowed to occur

seizeVerify(address,address,address,addr.notice: Validates seize and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.

transferAllowed(address,address,address,.notice: Checks if the account should be allowed to transfer tokens in the given market

transferVerify(address,address,address,u.notice: Validates transfer and reverts on rejection. May emit logs.
